body:
Day 9 - Manga 114
The art is getting better but the font stays the same. Sometimes I have to force my brain to read what is written and, after that, I can't really have as much fun.
Nevertheless a solid 7/10
เอิ่มดูดีมั่งน่ะ
The art is getting better, but still depressing, but better than the others 7/10
If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry,please forgive me
